definition: to act as surety for sb/to be sb's guarantor/to stand bail for sb
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: Implicitly, the UK government is guaranteeing the liabilities of the swollen UK banks.
sentences.chinese: 含蓄地說，英國政府在爲英國銀行庸腫的債務作保。

sentences.english: A patent-pending hinge secures your Kindle to the cover.
sentences.chinese: 正在申請專利的鉸鏈作保你點燃的封面。

sentences.english: My friends will vouch for me.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友們可以爲我作保。

sentences.english: Every loan was secured by bonds or mortgages.
sentences.chinese: 每項貸款都以債券或抵押作保。

sentences.english: She posted bail for the suspect.
A man void of understanding striketh hands, and becometh surety in the presence of his friend.
sentences.chinese: 在鄰舍面前擊掌作保，乃是無知的人。

sentences.english: It is senseless to give a pledge, to become surety for a neighbor.
sentences.chinese: 在鄰居面前擊掌作保，乃是無知的人。

sentences.english: They refused to bond a criminal.
sentences.chinese: 他們拒絕爲一名罪犯作保。

sentences.english: A foolish man will clap hands, when he is surety for his friend.
sentences.chinese: 常爲人擊掌作保，實是個無知之徒。

sentences.english: Do not be a man who strikes hands in pledge or puts up security for debts;
sentences.chinese: 不要與人擊掌，不要爲欠債的作保。

sentences.english: You must pay off your solution before securing another loan.
sentences.chinese: 你在借款作保前，必須清償整所有債務。

sentences.english: Be not thou one of them that strike hands, or of them that are sureties for debts.
sentences.chinese: 不要與人擊掌，不要爲欠債的作保。

sentences.english: Do not be one of those who give pledges, who become surety for debts.
sentences.chinese: 不要與人擊掌，不要爲欠債的作保。

definition: to intercede/to plead for sb else
to decide/to make decisions/to take responsibility (for deciding)/to be in charge/to give sb justice
to introduce (sb)/(esp.) to present to the emperor
to offend sb/to give offense/to displease
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
